index.name: bitcoin
index.subtitle: Bitcoin
index.about: Bitcoin uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority or banks; managing transactions and the issuing of bitcoins is carried out collectively by the network. Bitcoin is open-source; its design is public, nobody owns or controls Bitcoin and everyone can take part.
index.description: Read the best free ebooks about Bitcoin.

books.title: Mastering Bitcoin
books.description: Mastering Bitcoin is essential reading for everyone interested in learning about bitcoin basics, the technical operation of bitcoin, or if you're building the next great bitcoin killer app or business.
books.author: Andreas M. Antonopoulos
